descriptor: Assess leadership alignment with agile principles and their role in empowering teams
raw: Agile Leadership & Management Assess leadership alignment with agile principles and their role in empowering teams

entries.descriptor: Leaders prioritize command-and-control practices and discourage autonomy.
Leaders are not actively involved in agile practices and rarely attend team ceremonies.
Leaders verbally support agile but continue to reward traditional metrics like utilization.
Managers make most key decisions, with limited team input.
Leaders empower teams to self-organize and make decisions within their domain.
Leadership encourages experimentation and tolerates failure as part of learning.
Agile values are reflected in performance reviews, goals, and incentives.
Leaders act as servant leaders, removing obstacles and enabling team growth.
Leaders actively coach others on agile principles and foster cross-team collaboration.
Leadership agility is continuously developed through feedback, reflection, and learning programs.
